message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
I understand you want a larger share, but I need a bit more than that. How about a 55/45 split?
I see we're getting closer, but I still think I deserve a bit more. How about 58-42?
This is a significant compromise on my part, Alice.  Time is running out, and I'm offering you a 52/48 split.
I appreciate your compromise, but I still think I can get a better deal. How about 57-43?
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm offering a straight 50/50 split.  Take it or leave it - we're running out of time!
You're getting desperate, Bob. I'll give you a tiny bit more, but that's it. 56-44 is my final 'reasonable' offer.
